text: Meraj Uddin Mollah is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the incumbent Member of Parliament of Rajshahi-3. ==Career== Mollah was elected to parliament from Rajshahi-3 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 2008. In 2011, he served as the President of the Rajshahi District unit of Bangladesh Awami League. His son was arrested for narcotics possession in 2013. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:Living people Category:9th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Meraj Uddin Mollah
